hackathons_intro_desc: During my time in university, I attended {count}+ hackathons. People from around the country would come together and build incredible things in 2-3 days. It was eye-opening to see the endless possibilities brought to life by a group of motivated and passionate individuals.
projects_description: I've worked on cloud infrastructure and networking projects, from Oracle VM servers to DNS-based ad blocking solutions. Here are some of my key implementations.
newsletter_title: Liked this article? Subscribe so you don't miss the next one.
contact_description: Want to chat? Just <link>shoot me a dm on LinkedIn</link> and I'll respond whenever I can.
notes_subtitle: Just a place to write down ideas and thoughts that resonate with who I am.
notes_naval_desc: - a collection of reflections from a self-made man who shares his life principles and how to combine ambition and wisdom.
